WRITING.TITLE: [NEWS] The Party
WRITING.TEXT: An individual has been detained outside the home of The Governor today, and weapons have been confiscated from his person. He professed to having been a member of the "Prairie Party" looking to force The Republic of Texas to abandon the United States for the Midwestern republic. It is believed that his intentions were to hold the Governor until a dialogue could be opened to discuss this change, but was apprehended on the grounds before he could do anything.
As claimant of Texas, do i have any knowledge of the precedings?
As claimant of Texas, do i know about this too?

WRITING.TITLE: [CONFLICT] National Guard Training
WRITING.TEXT: The states of Texas and Oklahoma will be conducting Division-sized training exercises in the deserts in the states.These exersises will last four months, with One Division training each Month. They will preceed in this order: 1. Texas 56th Infantry Division 2. Texas 136th Armoured Division 3. Oklahoma 45th Infantry Division 4. Texas 72nd Infantry Division

WRITING.TITLE: [CLAIM] Republic Of Texas
WRITING.TEXT: The Republic of Texas, Under Jacob Hill and The United States of America, wishes to strengthen it's economic position and the position of the United States, while supporting them in all ventures. Texas would wish to suport both Israel and the DE-escalation of the conflict in that region. Texas believes that The United States can become greater, and wishes to help further that goal.
